testcase.name: Send requests with multiple payloads
testcase.system-out: Given url 'https://fakestoreapi.com/' ..................................... passed And path 'products' ....................................................... passed And request {"title": "test product","price": "13.5","description": "lorem ipsum set","image": "https://i.pravatar.cc","category": "electronic"} . passed And headers {"Content-Type": "application/json"} .......................... passed When method post .......................................................... passed Then match response == {"id": "#number", "title": "#string", "price": "#string", "description": "#string", "image": "#string", "category": "#string"} . passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed Then assert response.id==21 ............................................... passed Then assert response.title=='test product' ................................ passed Given url 'https://fakestoreapi.com/' ..................................... passed And path 'products', 2 .................................................... passed And headers {"Content-Type": "application/json"} .......................... passed When method get ........................................................... passed
